bridge-type.label: Home Connect API
bridge-type.description: This bridge represents the gateway to the Home Connect API.

parameter.name: clientSecret
parameter.label: Client secret
parameter.description: Application client secret (required for physical home appliances)

parameter.name: refreshToken
parameter.label: Refresh token
parameter.description: oAuth refresh token (required for physical home appliances)

thing-type.label: Dishwasher
thing-type.description: Home Connect connected dishwasher (Bosch or Siemens).

parameter.name: haId
parameter.label: haId
parameter.description: Unique identifier representing a specific home appliance.

channel-type.label: Power State
channel-type.description: This setting describes the current power state of the home appliance.

channel-type.label: Door State
channel-type.description: This status describes the state of the door of the home appliance. A change of that status is either triggered by the user operating the home appliance locally (i.e. opening/closing door) or automatically by the home appliance (i.e. locking the door).

channel-type.label: Operation State
channel-type.description: This status describes the operation state of the home appliance.

channel-type.label: Remote Start Allowance State
channel-type.description: This status indicates whether the remote program start is enabled. This can happen due to a programmatic change (only disabling), or manually by the user changing the flag locally on the home appliance, or automatically after a certain duration - usually 24 hours.

channel-type.label: Remote Control Activation State
channel-type.description: This status indicates whether the allowance for remote controlling is enabled.

channel-type.label: Active Program
channel-type.description: This status describes the active program of the home appliance.

channel-type.label: Remaining program time
channel-type.description: This status indicates the remaining program time of the home appliance.

channel-type.label: Progress State
channel-type.description: This status describes the program progress of the home appliance.
